H0.text: list of local government area in benue state. Makurdi

H1.text: list of local government area in benue state. Gboko

H2.text: list of local government area in benue state. Katsina-Ala

H3.text: list of local government area in benue state. Oju

A4.text: Makurdi doubles as the capital of the state and the headquarters of Makurdi LGA.

A5.text: The second group comprises towns with a population of between 20,000 and 50,000 people and includes Katsina-Ala, Zaki-Biam, Vandeikya and Adikpo.

A6.text: Makurdi Local Government Council existed in 1998 with Alhaji Al-Hassan Maikeke as chairman.
